name: Comfey
description: The Posy Picker Pokémon. It stretches sticky vines out from its head and picks flowers to adorn itself with. When it doesn’t have any flowers, it feels uneasy.

abilities.name: Flower Veil
abilities.description: Any grass-type ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is immune to new status effects.

abilities.name: Triage
abilities.description: This Pokémon's healing or draining moves have a move time of 1 bonus action.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: This Pokémon is cured of negative status ailments upon returning to its Pokeball.
